name: Cyberpunk (Detective is Somewhat Good at their Job)
name_original: Cyberpunk (Detective is Somewhat Good at their Job)
description:
An interactive text investigation game.

Take the mantle of Detective First-Name-Undefined Lien as they investigate a suspicious murder at a government facility responsible for the safety of their entire city.

Use your mouse to click on the highlited words and explore at your elaisure.

 You never know what weird shit you may find.
